text: Darius has asked you to come play football on the weekends.
sugges: Thank you, but no, I won’t be able to join you on the weekends since I’ve other commitments. We can do Wednesday evenings if that suits you.

text: Samantha has requested you to join the choir.
sugges: I’d love to, but at the moment, no. Thank you for asking though! It’s just that I’ve a lot of assignments to complete.

text: Raymond insists on joining his squad to bully another student.
sugges: No, thank you. I don’t want to be a part of such actions.

text: The teacher has asked you to join the Math olympiad.
sugges: Thank you for thinking of me, but not now. At the moment, I have to prepare for my exams. I’d be happy to participate next year.
